column4: how well would ubuntu run on a netbook??? anyone have any experience on this??
does it run smothly?? and how hard would it be to make a boot usb...?
Might go with one of the netbook-customized versions of ubuntu but I have it on mine with no problem  eeepc 701
Didn't have any problems and I have an OLD netbook.  the 701 is first generation netbook pre-atom.
